meanings.definition: Having the same rhyme throughout a poem or stanza.
meanings.sent1: The monorhymed poem had a consistent rhyme pattern.
meanings.sent2: Her monorhymed verses flowed smoothly from start to end.
meanings.sent3: The monorhymed lines danced together in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent4: The monorhymed words sang a melodious tune in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The monorhymed rhyme painted a vivid picture of unity in the poem.

meanings.definition: A poem or stanza with only one rhyme scheme.
meanings.sent1: The monorhymed was easy to follow with its single rhyme.
meanings.sent2: In the monorhymed, each line ended with the same sound.
meanings.sent3: The monorhymed stood out among the varied rhymes in the book.
meanings.sent4: Her monorhymed creation was a beacon of simplicity in poetry.
meanings.sent5: The monorhymed stanza echoed with the repetition of its rhyme.
